title: InterventionOnlyEvidence: New onset depression with bariatric surgery (Intervention Group) in JAMA 2018 Norwegian cohort study
description: Risk of New onset depression in intervention group was 8.9%.

variableDefinition.description: Cohort study with baseline data of exposures from November 2005 through July 2010 and follow-up data from 2006 until death or through December 2015 at a tertiary care outpatient center, Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway. Consecutive treatment-seeking adult patients (n = 2109) with severe obesity assessed (221 patients excluded and 1888 patients included). -- Intervention Group assigned to Bariatric surgery

observed.display: InterventionGroup: JAMA 2018 Norwegian cohort study Surgery cohort

statistic.description: 83 out of 932 observed with percentage of: 8.9%
